member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator
member.summary: Source generator that creates extension methods for converting Result<T> to IResult. This generator implements IIncrementalGenerator for optimal performance and caching.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.Initialize(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IncrementalGeneratorInitializationContext)
member.summary: Initializes the incremental generator pipeline.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.ParseConfiguration(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.AttributeData)
member.summary: Parses the configuration from the GenerateResultExtensions attribute.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateExtensionMethods(REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates the extension methods source code.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateMainExtensionClass(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates the main ResultToIResultExtensions class.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateToIResultMethod(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates the ToIResult<T> extension method.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateToIResultNonGenericMethod(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates the non-generic ToIResult method.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateCreateProblemDetailsMethod(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates the CreateProblemDetails helper method.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateDetermineStatusCodeMethod(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates the DetermineStatusCode helper method.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateHttpMethodExtensions(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates HTTP method-specific extension methods.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateImplicitConversions(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates implicit conversion operators.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration parsed from the GenerateResultExtensions attribute.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GenerateHelperClass(System.Text.StringBuilder,REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.ResultToIResultGenerator.GeneratorConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates a helper class for performance optimizations.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute
member.summary: Enables automatic generation of extension methods for converting Result<T> to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IResult. Apply this assembly-level attribute to projects that want to use the source generator.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace for the generated extension methods. Default is "Generated.ResultExtensions".

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute.IncludeErrorTags
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include error tags in ProblemDetails. Default is true.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute.LogErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to log errors during conversion. Default is false.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute.CustomErrorMappings
member.summary: Gets or sets custom error type to HTTP status code mappings. Format: "ErrorType:StatusCode,AnotherErrorType:AnotherStatusCode".

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute.GenerateHttpMethodExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generate HTTP method-specific extension methods (e.g., ToPostResult). Default is true.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.GenerateResultExtensionsAttribute.DefaultErrorStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default HTTP status code for errors that don't have a specific mapping. Default is 400 (Bad Request).
